resources.string: Authentification is required to access the source
the server got the request but refuse to run it, at the contrary of 401 error, authentication won\'t make the difference
Ok, the application can not work if you don\'t give us the grants to access to your account. Sorry we quit.

Bookable is small App that demostrate the use of Google Books API.

The API calls can be triggered directly using default credentials key registered on the App Or you can authorize the App to use google OAuth2
